resources.string: Welcome to the Face ID App
You will now begin the registration process by taking a selfie or a short 10 minute video.\n\n Please ensure that you are in a well lit area and have a good camera.
Make sure your face is clearly focussed and visible, then red button once to take a photo. \nIf you want to take a video, long-press the button instead and wait for 10 seconds.
Please enable access to your camera to begin.
Error connecting camera. Please try again
Error capturing photo, please try again.
Your registration was a success. You can now proceed to login.
Your registration failed because your face couldn\'t be detected properly. Please try again,
